```{r setup}

library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
```

Welcome!

```{r}

ChickWeight |>
  group_by(Diet, Time) |>
  summarize(avgWeight=mean(weight)) |>
  ggplot(mapping = aes(x=Time, y=avgWeight, color=Diet))+
  geom_line()+
  labs(title="Comparison of Chick Weights by Diet Over Time", x="Days", y="Weight(g)")




```
